byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: The private equity firm plans to announce that it has invested $80 million into Kount, whose products are meant to help clamp down on fraudulent online transactions.

headline.main: CVC Partners to Take Stake in Payments Security Provider

snippet: The private equity firm plans to announce that it has invested $80 million into Kount, whose products are meant to help clamp down on fraudulent online transactions.
